thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 31 of 3060
thread.title: Kathleen Etter

author: Kathleen Etter
title: Kathleen Etter
text: i've used this website before and don't ever recall having any problems with it - and in fact, the few times i didn't use it was due to the fact they had no cars available meeting my needs - my only somewhat negative observation about this website - and this is true of more than just rentalcars.com - is how expensive cars are with an automatic transmission, wow - nonetheless, if i needed a rental car, i would go to rentalcars.com first, to consider my options -
